net.proteusframework.users.authentication

Interface PasswordRuleChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllowAnythingPasswordRuleChecker, CredentialPolicyPasswordRuleChecker, LengthPasswordRuleChecker

    public interface PasswordRuleChecker
    Validate the rules for a password.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPassword(AuthenticationDomainList domains, CredentialPolicyLevel level, java.util.List<net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notification> notifications, java.lang.String password)
      Check a password and return message to user about any problems.
      @NonNull net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedObjectKey getRulesMessage(AuthenticationDomainList domains, CredentialPolicyLevel level)
      Get the message about the required password format.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPassword

        boolean checkPassword(AuthenticationDomainList domains,
                      CredentialPolicyLevel level,
                      java.util.List<net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notification> notifications,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Check a password and return message to user about any problems.
        Parameters:
        domains - the authentication domain(s) in which the password will be used.
        level - the policy level.
        notifications - notifications from checking the password.
        password - the password.
        Returns:
        true if password is ok, otherwise false.

      • getRulesMessage

        @NonNull net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedObjectKey getRulesMessage(AuthenticationDomainList domains,
                                                                             CredentialPolicyLevel level)
        Get the message about the required password format. Presented to user before entering a password.
        Parameters:
        domains - the authentication domain(s) in which the password will be used.
        level - the policy level.
        Returns:
        The rules message i18n key
